Manage resources, make political decisions, and deal with the different factions moving in.[/p][/*][*][p][b]Your ultimate goal?[/b] Stay in power until the end of the Age of Enlightenment... and leave your mark in history by building a grand [b]City's Fair[/b] during the Industrial Revolution.[/p][/*][*][p]But beware—your citizens have needs, factions grow in influence, and historical events can shake everything up. [/p][/*][*][p]Over time, they evolve into factions. These groups will support or oppose you, depending on your choices. [/p][/*][*][p]Let one grow too powerful, and your rule may be at risk.[/p][/*][/list][p][img width="615" height="50"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2228280/extras/96918816a05e592cd16bca5095a85188.webp?t=1748847801[/img][/p][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2228280/extras/294adaf244cb7abb8deceaf96c23a658.poster.avif?t=1748847801" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2228280/extras/294adaf244cb7abb8deceaf96c23a658.webm?t=1748847801" width="614" height="200"][/imgvid][/p][list][*][p][b]WONDERS & LEGACY[/b]
Build wonders inspired by real history: the Library of Alexandria, Notre-Dame, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, and more. Each one offers powerful bonuses but they also demand resources, time, and strategic choices. These monuments become the memory pillars of your city.[/p][/*][*][p][b]THE COLLECTION[/b]
At the end of the 5th Age, design a themed promenade to tell your city’s story. Select and organize your most iconic buildings to create a unique collection that highlights your choices, your architecture, and the rise of your dynasty: a memorable showcase to leave your mark on history.[/p][/*][/list]
data.strSnippet: In Memoriapolis, you're not just building a city, you're shaping a living, evolving civilization. Travel through five major eras, from Antiquity to the Industrial Revolution. Leave your mark on history by navigating the power struggles between rival factions.
